text: John Christopher Reilly (born May 24, 1965) is an Academy Award- and two-time Golden Globe-nominated American actor, comedian, singer and writer. == Other websites == * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Comedians from Chicago
title: John C. Reilly
